mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: Engengo
Film: Pattaakkathi bhairavan
---

---------------------------------------------------------------------
---
Notes: s g2 m1 p n2 S
here, g=g2, m=m1, n=n2 [unless otherwise specified]
---------------------------------------------------------------------

Engengo   sellum en ennangal
s g  sn.  s  sg  s  sn.s sp.
C D# CA#. C  CD# C  CA#.C CG.

ingethaan kanden pon vannangal
s g sn.   s  sg  s   sn.s  sp.
C D# CA#. C  CD# C   CA#.C CG.

en vaazhkai thaane  nilaave nilaave  ...
s  sg   sn. s   sg  s g  m  g m  p   p n S n p m      g m p g s n. sp.
C  CD#  CA#.C   CD# C D# F  D# F G   G A# C+ A# G F  D# F G D# C A#. CG.

(Engengo)


Stanza 1:

 Oh  kallaanavan     poovaagiren     
 Sp  Sp p  g pgsg    Sp p  g pgsg    
C+G C+G G D# GD#CD# C+G G D# GD#CD# 

 anbe             indrum            endrum
 g p gpgpgp..     p np npnpnp..     p Sp SpSpSp..
D# G D#GD#GD#G..  G A#G A#GA#GA#G.. G C+G C+GC+GC+G..

 edharkaaga  vaazhndhen unakkaagaa vaazhndhen
 SS   S  n3  R2S   Sp   mp  m  g   m     n
C+C+ C+  B   D+C+ C+G   FG  F D#   F     A#

 nee             naan             naam
 np npnpnp..     pg pgpgpg..      sn. sn.sn.sn. ..
A#G A#GA#GA#G..  GD# GD#GD#GD#..  CA#. CA#.CA#.CA#. ..
  
  
(Engengo)
